title: History Re-Written
description:
What if the history you knew wasn't true? That everything you've been led to believe was a lie?
After a sudden brush with death, James is intrigued by the possibility of the supernatural. James finds himself entangled in a web of secrets and shadows when he meets Alia, a girl whose beauty conceals a deadly secret. As they navigate the perilous landscape of love and betrayal, James must confront his demons and embrace the truth about Alia's supernatural identity.From the depths of despair to the heights of passion, their journey will test the limits of their courage and the strength of their bond. With danger lurking at every turn, James and Alia must confront their destinies and fight for a love that transcends the boundaries of life and death.Can their love survive a world of danger, forbidden desires and dark secrets that threaten to destroy them?Love, betrayal, and the thirst for truth collide in this gripping paranormal romance. Get your copy today and join James and Alia as they uncover the secrets that bind them and embrace a love that defies the boundaries of time and existence.
author: Ana Rayne
